name: blink
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.

abilities.title: Blink
abilities.description:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. 

Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: overwhelming_blink
lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.
notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.

abilities.title: Overwhelming Blink
abilities.description:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, all enemies in a 800 AoE take damage equal to 100 + 50% of your strength and an additional 100% over time, and have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds. 

Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: swift_blink
lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.
notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.

abilities.title: Swift Blink
abilities.description:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, you gain 40% phased movement speed and +35 Agility for 6 seconds. 

Swift Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: arcane_blink
lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.
notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.

abilities.title: Arcane Blink
abilities.description:
Teleport to a target point up to 1400 units away. 

After teleportation, you restore 250 health and 100 mana.

Arcane Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: blades_of_attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: helm_of_iron_will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: javelin
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

abilities.title: Pierce
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 25% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 60 bonus magical damage.

name: mithril_hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: quelling_blade
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
notes: Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.

abilities.title: Chop Tree
abilities.description: Destroy a target tree.

abilities.title: Quell
abilities.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 8 for melee heroes, and 4 for ranged.

name: faerie_fire
lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

abilities.title: Imbue
abilities.description: Instantly restores 85 health.

name: infused_raindrop
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.
notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.

abilities.title: Magical Damage Block
abilities.description:
Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage. 

Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

name: wind_lace
lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

name: ring_of_protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: stout_shield
lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.

abilities.title: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.

name: moon_shard
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

abilities.title: Consume
abilities.description: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

abilities.title: Shade Sight
abilities.description: Grants bonus night vision.

name: gauntlets
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: slippers
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: mantle
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: branches
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

abilities.title: Plant Tree
abilities.description: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

name: belt_of_strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: boots_of_elves
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: robe
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: crown
lore: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

name: diadem
lore: A crown that can never be removed.

name: ogre_axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: blade_of_alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: staff_of_wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: ultimate_orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: gloves
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: blitz_knuckles
lore: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

name: lifesteal
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

abilities.title: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of physical damage dealt.

name: voodoo_mask
lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

abilities.title: Magic Lifesteal
abilities.description: Magical damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health.

name: ring_of_regen
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: sobi_mask
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: boots
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: gem
lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
notes: Disabled while on a courier.

abilities.title: Reveal
abilities.description: Gives True Sight over a 300 radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.

abilities.title: True Sight
abilities.description: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

abilities.title: Everlasting
abilities.description: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

name: cloak
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.

name: talisman_of_evasion
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

name: cheese
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
notes: Cheese is shareable.

abilities.title: Fondue
abilities.description: Instantly restores 2500 health and 1500 mana.

name: magic_stick
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.

abilities.title: Energy Charge
abilities.description:
Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.

 Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: magic_wand
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.

abilities.title: Energy Charge
abilities.description:
Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. 

Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: ghost
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
notes:
Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.

abilities.title: Ghost Form
abilities.description: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

name: clarity
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

abilities.title: Replenish
abilities.description:
Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

name: enchanted_mango
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.

abilities.title: Eat Mango
abilities.description: Instantly restores 100 mana.

name: famango
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.

abilities.title: Eat Lotus
abilities.description: Instantly restores 125 health and mana.

name: great_famango
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.

abilities.title: Eat Lotus
abilities.description: Instantly restores 400 health and mana.

name: greater_famango
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.

abilities.title: Eat Lotus
abilities.description: Instantly restores 900 health and mana.

name: blood_grenade
lore: Both the hunter and the hunted must pay the blood price.

abilities.title: Throw Grenade
abilities.description: Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take 50 damage on impact, and be slowed by -15% and take 15 damage every 1s for 5 seconds. Radius 300.

name: royale_with_cheese
lore: First there was the Belt of Strength. Then there were the Boots of Travel. Now, at long last, the Block of Cheese.

abilities.title: Scrumptious
abilities.description: Try me!

name: flask
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

abilities.title: Salve
abilities.description:
Grants 30 health regeneration to the target for 13 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.

name: dust
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.
notes: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.

abilities.title: Reveal
abilities.description:
For 12 seconds, creates an area that reveals and slows invisible heroes by -20% in a 1050 radius where the caster was standing. Invisible units revealed by dust take 25 damage.

 The debuff effect on enemies lingers for 8s after leaving the area of effect.

name: bottle
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
notes:
Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
Using a stored Bounty or Water rune fully refills the bottle if the bottle was full when the rune was stored; otherwise, it refills two charges.

abilities.title: Regenerate
abilities.description:
Consumes a charge to restore 110 health and 60 mana over 2.7 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

abilities.title: Store Rune
abilities.description:
Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.

name: ward_observer
lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

abilities.title: Plant
abilities.description:
Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

name: ward_sentry
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

abilities.title: Plant
abilities.description:
Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 1050 radius.
Lasts 7 minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

name: ward_dispenser
lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.
notes: Hold Control to give one ward to an allied hero.

abilities.title: Plant
abilities.description: Plant the currently active ward. Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

name: tango
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

abilities.title: Devour
abilities.description:
Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with 3 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: 165

name: tango_single
lore: Om nom nom.

abilities.title: Devour
abilities.description:
Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Tree Range: 165

name: tpscroll
lore: What a hero truly needs.
notes:
If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
Teleport can be prevented or canceled by Root abilities.

abilities.title: Teleport
abilities.description:
After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. 

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

name: travel_boots
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

abilities.title: Town Portal Scroll
abilities.description: Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage.

name: travel_boots_2
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

abilities.title: Town Portal Scroll
abilities.description: Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown, channel time and does not consume a charge on usage.

name: phase_boots
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

abilities.title: Phase
abilities.description: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

name: demon_edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: eagle
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: ring_of_health
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

name: ring_of_tarrasque
lore: An ageless ring forged with an otherwise simple blood magic amplified by the presumed source of its key component.

name: void_stone
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: tiara_of_selemene
lore: A symbol of favor bestowed upon the high priestess of Selemene.

name: mystic_staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: energy_booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: point_booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: vitality_booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: fluffy_hat
lore: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.

name: power_treads
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
notes: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.

abilities.title: Switch Attribute
abilities.description: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.

name: phylactery
lore: An amulet overflowing with powerful magics.

abilities.title: Empower Spell
abilities.description: The next Unit Target spell you cast on an enemy deals a separate 150 bonus damage to the target and slows them by 30% for 3s.

name: angels_demise
lore: A blade sharp enough to slice through magic itself.

abilities.title: Empower Spell
abilities.description: The next Unit Target spell you cast on an enemy deals a separate 250 additional damage and applies a debuff that slows the target by 30% and disables their passives for 4s.

name: hand_of_midas
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
notes:
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.

abilities.title: Transmute
abilities.description:
Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience. Killing a neutral creep additionally grants a madstone bundle. 

 Cannot be used on Ancient creeps.

name: oblivion_staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: witch_blade
lore: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.

abilities.title: Witch Blade
abilities.description: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 0.75x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.

name: pers
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: cornucopia
lore: A source of spiritual and physical nourishment.

name: poor_mans_shield
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.

abilities.title: Damage Block
abilities.description:
Gives a 100% chance to block 30 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 20 damage on ranged.

Has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.

name: bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

name: wraith_band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

name: null_talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

name: mekansm
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
notes:
Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore or Guardian Greaves Mend within Mekansm's cooldown.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.

abilities.title: Restore
abilities.description: Restores 250 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.

abilities.title: Mekansm Aura
abilities.description: Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

name: vladmir
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
notes: Lifesteal on attacks against creeps is reduced to 12%.

abilities.title: Vladmir's Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 20% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1 mana regeneration, and 2 armor to nearby allies.

Radius: 1200

name: buckler
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

abilities.title: Buckler Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 2 armor to allied player units.

Radius: 1200

name: ring_of_basilius
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

abilities.title: Basilius Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 1 mana regeneration to allies. 

Radius: 1200

name: holy_locket
lore: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

abilities.title: Energy Charge
abilities.description:
Target an allied unit to instantly restore 17 health and mana per charge stored. 

Automatically gains a charge every 8 seconds and whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

abilities.title: Holy Blessing
abilities.description: Amplifies heals you provide by 15%.

name: pipe
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
notes:
Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.

abilities.title: Barrier
abilities.description:
Gives a magic damage barrier that absorbs 425 damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 8 seconds.

Radius: 1200

abilities.title: Insight Aura
abilities.description:
Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 8% magic resistance.

Radius: 1200

name: urn_of_shadows
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
notes:
Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Soul Release
abilities.description:
Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. 

Lasts 8 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

name: headdress
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

abilities.title: Regeneration Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 2 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

name: sheepstick
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

abilities.title: Hex
abilities.description:
Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 2.8 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

name: orchid
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

abilities.title: Soul Burn
abilities.description: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

name: bloodthorn
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

abilities.title: Soul Rend
abilities.description:
Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 60% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will deal additional damage equal to 50 if the attacker is a hero, and 25, if the attacker is a creep. Provides True Strike for your attacks and attacks from your controlled units against the silenced target.

abilities.title: Pierce
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 40% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 60 bonus magical damage.

name: echo_sabre
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

abilities.title: Echo Strike
abilities.description: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on the first strike.

name: cyclone
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
notes:
You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can dispel some buffs and debuffs.
Cyclone duration is unaffected by status resistance.

abilities.title: Cyclone
abilities.description:
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: wind_waker
lore: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.
notes:
Cyclone can dispel some buffs and debuffs.
When cast on yourself, the cyclone can be moved anywhere at a speed of 360.
Cyclone duration is unaffected by status resistance.

abilities.title: Cyclone
abilities.description:
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: aether_lens
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
notes: Passive does not stack.

abilities.title: Aethereal Focus
abilities.description: Increases targeted spell and item cast range.

name: force_staff
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
notes:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Force Staff has 850 cast range when cast on enemies.

abilities.title: Force
abilities.description: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

name: hurricane_pike
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.
notes:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.

abilities.title: Hurricane Thrust
abilities.description:
Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 6 seconds, allows you to make 5 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.

Can be cast on self or allies to push the target 600 units in the direction it is facing.
Enemy Range: 450

abilities.title: Dragon's Reach
abilities.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes.

name: dagon
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
notes: Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.title: Energy Burst
abilities.description:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

Damage: 400
 Mana Cost: 120

name: dagon_2
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
notes: Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.title: Energy Burst
abilities.description:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

Damage: 400
 Mana Cost: 120

name: dagon_3
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
notes: Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.title: Energy Burst
abilities.description:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

Damage: 400
 Mana Cost: 120

name: dagon_4
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
notes: Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.title: Energy Burst
abilities.description:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

Damage: 400
 Mana Cost: 120

name: dagon_5
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
notes: Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.title: Energy Burst
abilities.description:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. 

Damage: 400
 Mana Cost: 120

name: necronomicon
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

abilities.title: Demonic Summoning
abilities.description:
Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Warrior: Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 25
Mana Break Damage: 30
Last Will Damage: 600

Archer: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 37
Aura Move Speed: 5
Aura Radius: 1200

name: necronomicon_2
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

abilities.title: Demonic Summoning
abilities.description:
Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Warrior: Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 25
Mana Break Damage: 30
Last Will Damage: 600

Archer: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 37
Aura Move Speed: 5
Aura Radius: 1200

name: necronomicon_3
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

abilities.title: Demonic Summoning
abilities.description:
Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Warrior: Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 25
Mana Break Damage: 30
Last Will Damage: 600

Archer: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 37
Aura Move Speed: 5
Aura Radius: 1200

name: ultimate_scepter
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

abilities.title: Ability Upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

name: ultimate_scepter_2
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

abilities.title: Ability Upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

name: ultimate_scepter_roshan
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

abilities.title: Ability Upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

name: aghanims_shard
lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

abilities.title: Ability Upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero.

name: aghanims_shard_roshan
lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

abilities.title: Ability Upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero.

name: refresher
lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

abilities.title: Reset Cooldowns
abilities.description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities. Shares a cooldown with Refresher Shard. This item's cooldown only progresses in your hero's main inventory.

name: assault
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

abilities.title: Assault Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 30 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.

Radius: 1200

name: heart
lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

name: black_king_bar
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
notes:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Abilities that pierce magic immunity will work fully even when Avatar is activated

abilities.title: Avatar
abilities.description:
Applies a basic dispel. Grants 60% Magic resistance and immunity to pure and reflected damage. For the duration of the effect, any negative effect from enemy spells has no effect. 

Duration: 9 
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: aegis
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
notes: Pronounced as ayy jis.

abilities.title: Reincarnation
abilities.description:
Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. 

Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

name: shivas_guard
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
notes:
The wave extends at a speed of 400 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

abilities.title: Arctic Blast
abilities.description:
Emits a freezing wave that causes enemies to take 15% more damage from spells for 16 seconds, deals 200 magical damage and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds. Deals 150% damage to illusions.

Radius: 900

abilities.title: Freezing Aura
abilities.description:
Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45 and Health Restoration and Incoming Heal Amplification by 25%. 

Radius: 1200

name: bloodstone
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
notes: Using Bloodpact leaves you drained for 40 seconds and can't benefit from Bloodpact again during that time.

abilities.title: Bloodpact
abilities.description:
Increases Bloodstone's Spell Lifesteal by 4x. Lasts 5 seconds. 

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: sphere
lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
notes: Targeted abilities from neutral items do not trigger Spellblock.

abilities.title: Spellblock
abilities.description: Blocks most targeted spells once every 14 seconds.

abilities.title: Transfer Spellblock
abilities.description: Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 14 seconds.

name: lotus_orb
lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.
notes: Targeted abilities from neutral items do not trigger Echo Shell.

abilities.title: Echo Shell
abilities.description:
Applies a shield to the target unit for 5 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Meteor Hammer
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 400 AoE, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for 6 seconds. Non-building units are also slowed for 20% for the duration of the burn. 

Building Impact Damage: 90 
Building Over Time Damage: 50 

Non-Building Impact Damage: 130 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 50 

Channel Duration: 2 seconds.
Landing Time: 0.5 seconds.

name: nullifier
notes: Can be cast on invulnerable units.

abilities.title: Nullify
abilities.description:
Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 4 seconds. Continuously dispels and slows the target.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Combo Breaker
abilities.description: When you take damage and your health falls below 70%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that provides +75% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage. Cooldown increases every time it triggers.Dispel Type: Strong Dispel

name: refresher_shard
notes: Refresher Shard is shareable.

abilities.title: Reset Cooldowns
abilities.description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities. Shares a cooldown with Refresher Orb. This item's cooldown only progresses in your hero's main inventory.

name: spirit_vessel
notes: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Soul Release
abilities.description:
When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces Health Restoration by 70% and incoming heals by 70%. Deals 25 damage per second. 

When used on allies, it provides 40 health regeneration per second. 

Lasts 8 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units or the user dies. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

name: vanguard
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.

abilities.title: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants a 60% chance to block 50 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 25 damage on ranged.

name: crimson_guard
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.

abilities.title: Guard
abilities.description:
For 7 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block damage equal to 70 plus 2.2% of the casters max health value from each incoming attack.
Units may only be affected by Guard once every 35 seconds.

Radius: 1200

abilities.title: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants a 60% chance to block 75 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 50 damage on ranged.

name: blade_mail
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
notes:
Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blade Mail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.

abilities.title: Damage Return
abilities.description: For 5.5 seconds, return all incoming damage, increasing the percentage by 85%.

abilities.title: Damage Return
abilities.description: Everytime you are attacked, you return 20 damage plus 20% of the attack damage dealt to you.

name: soul_booster
lore: Regain lost courage.

name: hood_of_defiance
lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.

abilities.title: Barrier
abilities.description: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 350 magical damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

name: eternal_shroud
lore: A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.

abilities.title: Shroud
abilities.description: Restores mana equal to 25% of incoming enemy spell damage before reductions.

abilities.title: Eternal Endurance
abilities.description: For every 300 spell damage that equipped hero receives, it gains a stack of Endurance for 5s up to a maximum of 6 charges. Each charge increases Eternal Shroud's magic resistance by 3.5% .

name: rapier
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.

abilities.title: Transmute
abilities.description: Toggle to gain either 25% bonus spell amplification or 250 bonus attack damage.

abilities.title: Everlasting
abilities.description:
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. 

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.

name: monkey_king_bar
lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

abilities.title: Pierce
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 80% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

name: radiance
lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

abilities.title: Burn
abilities.description:
When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second and causes them to miss 15% of their attacks. Deals 150% damage to illusions. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.

Radius: 650

name: butterfly
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

name: greater_crit
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

abilities.title: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

name: basher
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
notes:
Does not stack with other sources of Bash.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Kez while in Sai mode.
Does not grant Bash to Clones and Tempest Doubles.

abilities.title: Bash
abilities.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.2 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

name: bfury
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
notes:
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.

abilities.title: Chop Tree
abilities.description: Destroy a target tree.

abilities.title: Quell
abilities.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 10 for melee heroes, and 5 for ranged.

abilities.title: Cleave
abilities.description: Deals 60% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. Deals 40% against creeps. (Melee Only)

name: manta
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
notes:
Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

abilities.title: Mirror Image
abilities.description:
Creates 2 images of your hero that last 18 seconds. 

Melee images deal 33% damage, while Ranged images deal 28%. Illusions take 300% damage. 

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: lesser_crit
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

abilities.title: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

name: dragon_lance
lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.
notes: Passive does not stack.

abilities.title: Dragon's Reach
abilities.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes.

name: armlet
lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
notes:
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.

abilities.title: Unholy Strength
abilities.description:
When active, Unholy Strength grants +35 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 45 health per second.

 You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

name: invis_sword
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
notes:
Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.title: Shadow Walk
abilities.description:
Makes you invisible for 17 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. 

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.

name: silver_edge
lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

abilities.title: Shadow Walk
abilities.description:
Makes you invisible for 17 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units. 

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 300 bonus physical damage and disable their passive abilities for 6 seconds.

name: sange_and_yasha
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

name: kaya_and_sange
lore: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.

name: yasha_and_kaya
lore: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.

name: satanic
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

abilities.title: Unholy Rage
abilities.description:
Increases Lifesteal percentage to 175% for 6 seconds. 

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of physical damage dealt.

name: mjollnir
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.
Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.

abilities.title: Static Charge
abilities.description: Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 225 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

abilities.title: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 180 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion. Deals 150% damage to illusions.

name: skadi
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

abilities.title: Cold Attack
abilities.description: Attacks lower enemy movement by -25% if they are melee and -50% if they are ranged. Attacks also lower enemy attack speed by -20%. Additionally it reduces Health Restoration by 40% and Incoming Heals by 40% Lasts for 3 seconds.

name: sange
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

name: helm_of_the_dominator
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
notes:
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time. If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.

abilities.title: Dominate
abilities.description:
Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1000. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor. 

Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000 retain their original max health. Grants the caster the gold and experience bounty of the dominated creep. Dominated unit's bounty is set to 100 gold and it can no longer be killed by abilities that instantly kill creeps otherwise.

name: helm_of_the_overlord
lore: The powerful headpiece of an undead necromancer.
notes:
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling will cause dominated units to die.

abilities.title: Dominate
abilities.description:
Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1800. Also provides the unit with +70 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen, +7 armor, and levels up some abilities of the target by 1 level. 

Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1800 retain their original max health. Grants the caster the gold and experience bounty of the dominated creep. Dominated unit's bounty is set to 250 gold and it can no longer be killed by abilities that instantly kill creeps otherwise.

name: maelstrom
lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

abilities.title: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 110 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion. Deals 150% damage to illusions.

name: gungir
lore: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.

abilities.title: Eternal Chains
abilities.description: Roots all enemies in a 350 radius for 2 seconds.

name: desolator
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.

abilities.title: Corruption
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -6 for 7 seconds.

abilities.title: Soul Stealer
abilities.description: Desolator gains +2 damage every time an enemy hero dies while affected by Corruption, to a maximum of 30.

name: yasha
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

name: mask_of_madness
lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

abilities.title: Berserk
abilities.description: Gives 110 attack speed and 25 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you. Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.title: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of physical damage dealt.

name: diffusal_blade
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
notes: Does not stack with other diffusal blades.

abilities.title: Inhibit
abilities.description: Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.

abilities.title: Manabreak
abilities.description:
Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. 

Burns 8 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

name: disperser
lore: Once entrusted to an Apostle General of the Rumusque Faithful's expeditionary force.

abilities.title: Suppress
abilities.description:
Slows the target for 5 seconds if they are an enemy or applies a basic dispell and grants bonus movespeed and 40% slow resistance for 5 seconds if they are an ally. Caster is always granted the ally benefit on cast.

Both movement speed reduction and increase start at 100% and gradually decrease to 0% over the course of the buff duration.
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Manabreak
abilities.description:
Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. 

Burns 8 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

name: ethereal_blade
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take -40% bonus magic damage.
For Universal Heroes, their primary attribute is 45% of the sum of all their attributes.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.

abilities.title: Ether Blast
abilities.description:
Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

 Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 1.5x your target's primary attribute + 50 as magical damage.
Duration: 4 seconds

name: soul_ring
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.
notes: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.

abilities.title: Sacrifice
abilities.description:
Consume %abilityhealthcost% health to temporarily gain 170 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

name: arcane_boots
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.

abilities.title: Replenish
abilities.description:
Restores 150 mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: 1200

abilities.title: Basilius Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 1 mana regeneration to allies. 

Radius: 1200

name: octarine_core
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

abilities.title: Cooldown Reduction
abilities.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.

name: orb_of_venom
lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
notes: Does not stack with its upgrades.

abilities.title: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Poisons the target, dealing 10 magical damage per second. Lasts for 3 seconds.

name: blight_stone
lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.
notes: Does not stack with its upgrades, Desolator, or Stygian Desolator.

abilities.title: Lesser Corruption
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2 for 3 seconds.

name: orb_of_corrosion
lore: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.
notes: Armor reduction does not stack with its components, Desolator, or Stygian Desolator.

abilities.title: Corrosion
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2, slows their movement by -16% (-8% against melee targets), and reduces Health Restoration by 16%. Lasts for 3 seconds.

name: orb_of_frost
lore: Slowly growing since the universe began, it will envelop everything when it ends.

abilities.title: Frost
abilities.description: Your attacks slow the target's movement by -13% (-6% against melee targets), and reduces Health Restoration by 13%. Lasts for 3 seconds.

name: falcon_blade
lore: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.

name: mage_slayer
lore: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.

abilities.title: Mage Slayer
abilities.description: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, dealing 20 damage per second and causing them to do 40% less spell damage for 3 seconds.

name: ancient_janggo
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

abilities.title: Endurance
abilities.description:
Gives +35 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds.

Radius: 1200

abilities.title: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 15 movement speed to allies. 

Radius: 1200

name: boots_of_bearing
lore: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.

abilities.title: Endurance
abilities.description:
Gives +50 attack speed and +15% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. For the first 1.5 seconds allies are immune to slows.

 Radius: 1200

abilities.title: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 20 movement speed to allies. 

Radius: 1200

name: medallion_of_courage
lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.
notes: Shares cooldown with Solar Crest.

abilities.title: Valor
abilities.description:
If cast on an ally, grants them the -6 armor, and removing it from the caster. 

If cast on an enemy, reduces -6 armor on both the enemy and the caster. .

Duration: 8

name: solar_crest
lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.
notes: Shares cooldown with Pavise.

abilities.title: Shine
abilities.description:
When cast on an ally, grants them 5 armor, 60 attack speed, 15% movement speed and a 350 physical damage barrier. 

Does not grant bonus armor, movement or attack speed if used on self. 

Duration: 7

name: pavise
lore: Devised by a wizard who made one too many enemies.

abilities.title: Protect
abilities.description: When cast on an ally, grants them a physical damage barrier that absorbs 250 damage. Duration: 7s.

name: smoke_of_deceit
lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

abilities.title: Disguise
abilities.description:
Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 45 seconds. 

 While the caster is still disguised, any allies that come within 300 range of them will also get the buff applied to them. Each smoke can only be applied once to allies. 

Attacking or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. 

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.

name: tome_of_knowledge
lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

abilities.title: Enlighten
abilities.description: Grants you 750 experience plus 150 per tome consumed by your team after the first two.

name: veil_of_discord
lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

abilities.title: Magic Weakness
abilities.description:
Cast a 900 radius blast that causes enemy heroes to take 10% increased damage from spells.

Can be cast while channeling.

Duration: 16 seconds.

name: revenants_brooch
lore: The cursed brooch of a fallen guardian who stalks forever between the veil of life and death.
notes:
Counts as a Critical Strike for purposes of stacking with other sources of Critical Strike.
Phantom Critical does not work against buildings.

abilities.title: Phantom Critical
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal an additional 80% of the attack's damage as bonus magic damage.

name: devastator
lore: Warning: There is no antidote if picked up by the wrong end.

abilities.title: Witch Blade
abilities.description: Causes your next attack to have true strike, apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 0.75x your intelligence as damage every second.

abilities.title: Magic Corruption
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the enemy's Magic resistance by 20% for 4 seconds.

name: guardian_greaves
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
notes:
The aura boost only applies to heroes.
Mend does not affect units that have been affected by Mend or Mekansm Restore within Guardian Greaves' cooldown.

abilities.title: Mend
abilities.description:
Restores 325 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: 1200
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Guardian Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 2.5 health regeneration, 1.5 mana regeneration and 3 armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 25%, this is increased to 14.5 health regeneration, 5 mana regeneration and 8 armor. 

Radius: 1200

name: rod_of_atos
lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

abilities.title: Cripple
abilities.description: Roots the target for 2 seconds.

name: iron_talon
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.
notes: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.

abilities.title: Chop
abilities.description:
Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 80% of its current HP.

If cast on a tree, instantly destroys it.

name: abyssal_blade
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
notes:
The stun is melee range.
Does not stack with other bashes, and does not grant bash to Clones and Tempest Doubles.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Kez while in Sai mode.

abilities.title: Overwhelm
abilities.description:
Stuns a target enemy unit for 1.6 seconds. 

Pierces Debuff Immunity.

abilities.title: Bash
abilities.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.2 seconds and deal 120 bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

name: heavens_halberd
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

abilities.title: Disarm
abilities.description: Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 4 seconds on ranged targets.

abilities.title: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants a 60% chance to block 60 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 30 damage on ranged.

name: ring_of_aquila
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
notes: Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

abilities.title: Aquila Aura
abilities.description:
Grants 1 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies.

Radius: 1200

abilities.title: Aura
abilities.description: Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.

name: tranquil_boots
lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

abilities.title: Break
abilities.description: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.

name: shadow_amulet
lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.
notes: Takes 1.25s of the 3.5s for the hero to fully fade into invisibility.

abilities.title: Fade
abilities.description: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero for 3.5s. Movement speed during the invisibility is reduced by 35%.

name: glimmer_cape
lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

abilities.title: Glimmer
abilities.description:
After a 0.5 second delay, grants invisibility, 20 movement speed and a magic damage barrier that absorbs up to 375 damage to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.

Can be cast while channeling.

name: keen_optic
lore: Stolen from a tinker's shop ages ago, this handy lens has seen service to many owners.

name: grove_bow
lore: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.

abilities.title: Magic Amp
abilities.description: Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 20%.

name: quickening_charm
lore: An evergreen amulet of druidic origins.

abilities.title: Cooldown Reduction
abilities.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.

name: philosophers_stone
lore: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

name: force_boots
lore: Elusive marvels never successfully studied for proper classification in the archives.
notes: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Force
abilities.description:
Pushes the target 750 units in the direction they are facing. Dispels if cast on an ally.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Speed Unlock
abilities.description: Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer

name: desolator_2
lore: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.
notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.

abilities.title: Greater Corruption
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -13 for 7 seconds.

abilities.title: Rebirth
abilities.description: Lethal damage is prevented and instead the wearer is healed to half health and non-ultimate ability cooldowns reset. Gets consumed on trigger.

name: seer_stone
lore: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.

abilities.title: Reveal
abilities.description: Reveal a target 800 area of the map for 6 seconds.

abilities.title: Consume
abilities.description:
Restores 500 health and 250 mana to the target over 6 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

name: force_field
lore: An exquisite piece commissioned by a paranoid monarch who choked on a piece of fruit long before the item saw its intended use.

abilities.title: Mega Shield
abilities.description: Force Field Aura Grants 25% Damage Reflection for 5 seconds.

abilities.title: Shield
abilities.description: Grants +4 armor and +8% Magic Resistance to all other allies within 1200 radius.

name: black_powder_bag
lore: One of a set of custom rigs once worn by infamous road agents in the Outlands, its siblings have been lost to misfires and the various tides of time.

abilities.title: Hair Trigger
abilities.description: The next time you get attacked by a hero within 400 range, explode dealing 250 damage to all enemies within a 400 radius and causing them to miss 100% of their attacks for 2 seconds.

abilities.title: Toughen Up
abilities.description: Grants you an extra 6 bonus armor at the cost of -20 movement speed. Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.title: Imbue
abilities.description: Instantly restores 250 health.

name: timeless_relic
lore: An unmarred discovery from the excavated ruins of an ancient wizard's academy.

name: mirror_shield
lore: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.

abilities.title: Echo Shield
abilities.description: Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 12 seconds.

name: ironwood_tree
lore: Precious. And hearty as a weed.

abilities.title: Plant Tree
abilities.description: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

abilities.title: Plant a Mango Tree
abilities.description: Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every 60 seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area .

name: royal_jelly
lore: To those who harvest olgru jelly, success serves more than mere profit--it's often the means to survival--for only the jelly itself can cure the ravages that follow a sting from the vigilant denizens of the giant hives.

abilities.title: Consume
abilities.description:
Consumes all charges and grants a target allied unit a buff that provides +2.5 Health Regen and +1.25 Mana Regen per charge for 8s. 

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

name: pupils_gift
lore: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.
notes: Grants two-thirds value to each attribute for Universal Heroes

abilities.title: Consume
abilities.description: Temporarily grants an allied target the Aghanim's Scepter buff for 3 minutes.

abilities.title: Building Repair
abilities.description: Targets a building, restoring 40% of it's health over 30 seconds. Also grants +10 armor during this period.

name: mind_breaker
lore: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.

abilities.title: Silence Strike
abilities.description: The next attack silences the hit enemy for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.title: True Sight
abilities.description: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 500 range of its carrier.

abilities.title: Charge Loss
abilities.description: Loses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.

name: spell_prism
lore: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.

abilities.title: Cooldown Reduction
abilities.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.

abilities.title: Hex Strike
abilities.description: The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for 1.5 seconds.

name: imp_claw
lore: Though their tasks are largely thankless, demon hunters can often turn a profit bartering parts in Weeping Rose.

abilities.title: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing 130% damage.

name: flicker
lore: The technically-true-to-his-word 'teleportation device' crafted by a notorious fae trickster.

abilities.title: Flicker
abilities.description:
Dispells debuffs and blinks you in a random forward direction for a random distance between 200 and 600. If cast within 3 seconds of receiving player damage, it will blink in place.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: spy_gadget
lore: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.

abilities.title: Prescient Aura
abilities.description: Lowers Scan cooldown by 50% . Increases attack range (Ranged only) and cast range of allies in a 1200 unit radius.

name: spider_legs
lore: A horrifying yet useful mixture of necromancy and artificing.

abilities.title: Skitter
abilities.description: Grants you 20% bonus movement speed, 50% improved turn rate, and free pathing for 10 seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.

name: helm_of_the_undying
lore: The price for wearing it is paid in the afterlife.

abilities.title: Death Delay
abilities.description: Survive for an extra 5 seconds after receiving a killing blow. If any enemy heroes dies within 1200 units, the death delay effect is extended by 5 seconds.

name: vambrace
lore: The coveted treasure that divided the heirs of Queen Raiya upon her death, resulting in the eventual downfall of her kingdom.

abilities.title: Consume
abilities.description: Grants the target the bonuses of every Power Rune for 50 seconds. Each use consumes a charge.

name: ocean_heart
lore: A charm blessed by the Council of the Brine.

abilities.title: Water Regen
abilities.description: Provides you with 10 HP regen and 5 mana regen while in the river.

name: spark_of_courage
lore: A common battle charm in the armies that served the Children of Light.

abilities.title: Courage
abilities.description: Provides 10 damage when the hero is above 50% Health, and 5 armor when they are below that threshold.

name: broom_handle
lore: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

name: trusty_shovel
lore: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.
notes:
16% chance for a Bounty Rune.
28% chance each for a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or a kobold.
The same Trusty Shovel cannot find the same reward twice in a row.

abilities.title: Dig
abilities.description:
Channel for 1 second. 
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Healing Salve, an Enchanted Mango, or a Kobold. If digging in a river, always digs up a Water Rune.

name: nether_shawl
lore: An otherworldly garment tethered to our plane by unknown means.

name: dragon_scale
lore: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.

abilities.title: Afterburn
abilities.description: Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 22 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.

name: essence_ring
lore: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.

abilities.title: Life Essence
abilities.description: Increases your current and max health by 240 for 10 seconds.

abilities.title: Ensnare
abilities.description: Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for 1.75 seconds.

name: enchanted_quiver
lore: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

abilities.title: Certain Strike
abilities.description: Empowers your next attack with 250 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +350 bonus range for the attack.

name: ninja_gear
lore: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.

abilities.title: Solitary Disguise
abilities.description: Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only that lasts for up to 15 seconds.

name: illusionsts_cape
lore: A dashing cape whose creator insists on calling 'Cloak of Apparition' as opposed to his assistant's 'Illusion' drivel.

abilities.title: Create Illusion
abilities.description: Creates an image under your control.

abilities.title: Illusion Mastery
abilities.description: Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by 6%.

abilities.title: Havoc
abilities.description: Pulls enemies in a 400 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 + 1.5x your str as magical damage.

abilities.title: Rejuvenate
abilities.description: When the wearer's health falls below 20%, they will receive a strong dispel and be healed for 1500 health.Dispel Type: Strong Dispel

name: apex
lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.
notes: Grants +24 to each attribute for Universal Heroes.

name: ballista
lore: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.

abilities.title: Knockback
abilities.description: Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 50 pure damage with every attack.

abilities.title: Woodland Stride
abilities.description: Create a path of trees behind you for 3 seconds. Trees last up to 15 seconds.

abilities.title: Tree Walking
abilities.description: Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees.

name: demonicon
lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.
notes:
The Demonic Warrior has 1600 Health, 4 Armor, 40% Magic Resistance, 380 Movement Speed, 134 Attack Damage, 50 Mana Burn on Hit, 800 Damage on Death, and 1000 True Sight Radius.
The Demonic Archer has 1300 Health, 4 Armor, 40% Magic Resistance, 425 Movement Speed, 131 Attack Damage, a basic dispel ability with a slow on a 15s Cooldown, and a 9% Bonus Movement Speed Aura.

abilities.title: Greater Demonic Summoning
abilities.description: Summon 2 demonic warriors and 2 demonic archers that last 65 seconds. The Warrior burns mana every hit, reveals invisible units, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. The Archer has a basic dispel ability with a slow and a passive movement speed aura.

name: fallen_sky
lore: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.

abilities.title: Fallen Sky
abilities.description:
Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after 1 seconds in a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 1.6 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every 1 seconds to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds.

Building Impact Damage: 75 
Building Over Time Damage: 60 

Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 60

Fallen Sky cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: pirate_hat
lore: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.

abilities.title: Plunder
abilities.description: Steals 150 gold from enemy heroes that die within 2400 units. If the wearer is the killer, there is no range limit and an additional 400 gold is stolen.

abilities.title: Buried Treasure
abilities.description: Gold loss on death reduced by 100%.

name: ex_machina
lore: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.

abilities.title: Reset Cooldowns
abilities.description: Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).

name: faded_broach
lore: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

name: paladin_sword
lore: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.

name: minotaur_horn
lore: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.

abilities.title: Lesser Avatar
abilities.description:
Applies a basic dispel. Grants 50% Magic resistance and immunity to pure and reflected damage for 2s. For the duration of the effect, any negative effect from enemy spells has no effect.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: orb_of_destruction
lore: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.

abilities.title: Impeding Corruption
abilities.description: Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.

name: the_leveller
lore: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.

abilities.title: Level
abilities.description: Attacks deal 35% more damage to buildings.

name: arcane_ring
lore: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.

abilities.title: Replenish Mana
abilities.description:
Restores mana equal to 30 + 3% of the caster's maximum mana pool to all nearby allies. 

 Radius: 1200

name: titan_sliver
lore: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.

name: chipped_vest
lore: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.

abilities.title: Chipper
abilities.description: Everytime you are attacked, you return 30 damage to heroes and 20 damage to creeps.

name: elven_tunic
lore: Even simple items of elven make seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.

name: cloak_of_flames
lore: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

abilities.title: Immolate
abilities.description:
Burns enemy units for 45 damage per second. Illusions deal 30 damage per second.

Radius: 375

name: trickster_cloak
lore: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

abilities.title: Cloak
abilities.description: Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.

name: possessed_mask
lore: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.
notes: Grants 1/3rd of the value to each attribute for Universal Heroes.

abilities.title: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for 7 HP on each attack.

name: penta_edged_sword
lore: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.

abilities.title: Maim
abilities.description: Each attack has a 25% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 for 3 seconds.

name: bullwhip
lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.
notes: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Whip
abilities.description: Grants 25% movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by 25% when cast on enemies. Lasts 4 seconds.

name: psychic_headband
lore: A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.
notes: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Psychic Push
abilities.description: Pushes the target enemy unit away from you 400 distance.

name: ceremonial_robe
lore: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.

abilities.title: Ceremonial Aura
abilities.description:
Lowers enemy Status Resistance by 10% and Magic Resistance by 10%.

Radius: 1200

name: quicksilver_amulet
lore: An enchanted talisman brimming with a mysterious substance.

abilities.title: Quicksilver
abilities.description: Grants you a bonus 5% movement speed and 20 attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.

name: book_of_shadows
lore: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.
notes: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Shadows
abilities.description: Target an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable from enemies to the caster, but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 4 seconds. Applies a Basic Dispel.

name: giants_ring
lore: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.

abilities.title: Giant's Foot
abilities.description: Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.

abilities.title: Vengeance's Shadow
abilities.description: Upon death, you spawn a strong-illusion that deals 100% damage and takes 150% damage. Can cast all basic spells. Illusion casts 30 seconds.

name: stormcrafter
lore: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.

abilities.title: Bottled Lightning
abilities.description: Zaps 2 enemy targets within 700 range, dealing 175 damage and a 40% slow for 0.4 seconds. Strikes every 3.5 seconds.

name: mysterious_hat
lore: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.

name: ascetic_cap
lore: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.

abilities.title: Endurance
abilities.description: Whenever a debuff would be applied to the owner, grant 40% Status resistance and 40% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds.

name: misericorde
