lore: An infamous assassin's blade stolen and smuggled out of White Spire after its owner's mysterious demise.

abilities.title: Dark Mercy
abilities.description: Your attacks deal 3 more damage to enemies for each 7% HP they are missing.

name: heavy_blade
lore: With ready access to test subjects, untold cruelties have been dreamed up and loosed upon the world from within the walls of the Tyler Estate.

abilities.title: Cleanse
abilities.description:
Dispel Target Enemy or Ally.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

abilities.title: Subjugate
abilities.description: Your attacks deal bonus damage equal to 4% of your target Max Mana.

name: unstable_wand
lore: A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.

abilities.title: Pig, Out!
abilities.description: Turns your hero into a critter for 3 seconds and gives them +20% Movement Speed.

name: pogo_stick
lore: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.

abilities.title: Vault
abilities.description: Propels your hero forward 300 units. Tumbler's Toy gets disabled for 3 seconds if its owner receives damage from a player source.

name: paintball
lore: Those marked for death by the fae shine brightly to all manner of creatures in the shadow realm.
notes: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

abilities.title: Shadow Brand
abilities.description: Throws a Mark towards an enemy within 900 range applying a debuff that deals 40 damage every second and provides vision of the unit for 7 seconds.

name: seeds_of_serenity
lore: An evergreen sprout treasured by the woodkin and highly coveted by interlopers and their like.

abilities.title: Verdurous Dale
abilities.description: Target the ground with a 400 radius. Provides health regeneration to all allied units while they are in the area of effect equal to 6 + 25% of the caster's health regeneration at the time of casting. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: lance_of_pursuit
lore: The gleaming weapon of a tarnished knight haunted by his duties to an unworthy king.

abilities.title: Hound
abilities.description: Attacking from behind slows enemies by 16% (8% if Ranged) and deals 20 more damage. Slow lasts 2 second(s).

name: occult_bracelet
lore: A band that bears effigy of the dark goddess Eloshar's unsleeping eye.

abilities.title: Rites of Eloshar
abilities.description: Each time the wearer is attacked, they gain a stack of 0.4 mana regen, up to 5 stacks. Stacks last for 5 seconds.

abilities.title: Ogre Seal Flop
abilities.description: Flop forward like an ogre seal 2 times, dealing 250 damage and slowing enemies in a 275 radius by -100% for 1.5 second on each bounce. 400 bounce distance.

name: harpoon
lore: A perfect solution for the flight of foes.

abilities.title: Draw Forth
abilities.description: When targeting an enemy, fire a harpoon at them, that pulls you and the target closer together, up to 35% of the distance between you and your target. If the caster is melee, the hero and target are always pulled to within melee distance of each other.

abilities.title: Echo Strike
abilities.description: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 1 seconds on the first strike. Echo Strike cooldown: 5s

abilities.title: Reciprocity
abilities.description: When attacked, the hero counter-attacks a target within their attack range. 5s Cooldown.

name: eye_of_the_vizier
lore: The ring of a cunning court mage who imprisoned a cadre of enemies to serve as his personal mana reserve.

name: specialists_array
lore: An impressive kit of trigger enhancements born in an aging assassin's idle mind.

abilities.title: Crackshot
abilities.description: Ranged Only. The next attack fires projectiles that deal 10 bonus damage at 2 additional targets within attack range plus a 225 range bonus. Does not trigger attack modifiers.

name: dagger_of_ristul
lore: A sinister shiv that grants favor to those willing to stain its blade with a sacrifice of their own blood.

abilities.title: Imbrue
abilities.description: Consume 100 health to temporarily gain 40 damage. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: ofrenda
lore: Take joy in remembering those beloved who've passed now beyond the veil.

abilities.title: Honor the Dead
abilities.description: Place this Offering on an Altar to honor the dead with a memory from those they left behind.

name: ofrenda_shovel
lore: You don't know where it came from, but it knows where you need to go. All you need to do is dig.

abilities.title: Dig
abilities.description: Search the map for Offerings to the dead.

name: ofrenda_pledge
lore: This item seems unstable. Like it might just disappear.

abilities.title: Undying Promise
abilities.description: Signal to the spirits of the other realm your commitment to honoring them. If everyone in the battle makes an Undying Promise before the fight begins, the dead might be willing to listen.

name: muertas_gun
lore: One to deliver the body, the other to claim the soul.
notes:
Feared enemies are phased and unslowable.
The ricochet will travel 1x Dead Shot's cast range.

abilities.title: Dead Shot
abilities.description: Fires a ghostly bullet at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes it will deal 300 damage and slow the target by -100% for 0.5 seconds, then ricochet in the vector-targeted direction. The ricochet will damage all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet will be feared for 2 seconds in the direction of the shot.

abilities.title: Vengeance
abilities.description: Provides 30 damage if equipped hero is Silenced and 20 armor if equipped hero is Stunned.

abilities.title: Boldness
abilities.description: Grants 20 attack speed as long as there are enemy heroes within 1200 units.

abilities.title: Ancient Power
abilities.description: Grants 50 extra bonus damage as long as the unit is within 2000 range of an ancient.

abilities.title: Bubbled Up
abilities.description: Equipped Hero has a 100 HP Barrier against enemy damage. Barrier fully regenerates after not receiving damage for 8 seconds. Self-inflicted damage bypasses the barrier.

name: whisper_of_the_dread
lore: The air that passes through this amulet makes a dreadful sound.

abilities.title: Tunnel Vision
abilities.description: Equipped Hero has their daytime vision reduced by 15% but their Spell damage increased by 10%.

abilities.title: Glass Cannon
abilities.description: Hero takes 6% more damage from all sources.

abilities.title: Glassify
abilities.description: When attacking a hero, apply a debuff increasing the damage received by that hero by 12% for 5 seconds. Only one target can be affected by Glassify at the same time.

abilities.title: Free Bird
abilities.description: When equipped hero is below 30% HP, they gain flying movement.

abilities.title: Unwavering
abilities.description: Hero's Max Health is set to 1800 and can't be altered by other effects or attributes.

abilities.title: Magical Damage Block
abilities.description: Every 12s, blocks up to 300 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage.

abilities.title: Martyrdom
abilities.description: Redirect 25% of all magic damage dealt to your allied heroes within 900 radius towards you for 10 seconds.

abilities.title: Sixth Sense
abilities.description: Automatically dodge an attack from an enemy hero.

abilities.title: Reverberate
abilities.description: After taking 180 damage from any source, the wearer fires a projectile at up to 2 random enemies in a 600 radius, prioritizing heroes, that deal 125 physical damage and slow the targets movement and attack speed by 100% for 0.2s.

abilities.title: Flip
abilities.description: Toggle to convert 30% of your Max Health to Max Mana, or 30% of your Max Mana to Max Health.

abilities.title: Place Banner
abilities.description:
Creates a banner at the target location. Lane creeps in the area of effect become damage immune while the Banner is up. Lasts 120 seconds.

 Can be destroyed. Melee hero attacks deal 2x damage to the banner.

abilities.title: Profane Knowledge
abilities.description:
Hero kills and assists empower the Black Grimoire, granting it charges. Right-click to consume and grant 200 experience per charge. Starts on cooldown. 
This item cannot be dropped.

name: enhancement_fleetfooted
notes: Does not stack with Movement Speed bonuses from boots

name: enhancement_evolved
notes: Grants +24 to each attribute for Universal Heroes.

name: unrelenting_eye
lore: A serpent's eye the size of a melon (and just as moist).

abilities.title: Relentless
abilities.description:
Increases slow resistance by 100%. This bonus is reduced by 20% for every enemy hero within 600 units.

Increases status resistance by 10% for every enemy hero within 600 units.

name: mana_draught
lore: A refreshing drink best shared with friends.

abilities.title: Bottoms Up
abilities.description:
Restores 60 + 4% of the caster's maximum mana over 6 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

abilities.title: Fill Up
abilities.description: Cooldown Speed of Mana Draught is increased by 30% while in water.

name: rippers_lash
lore: The Fae horticulturists of Revtel are known to push the boundaries of both cross pollination and safety.

abilities.title: Flay
abilities.description: Embeds thorns into all enemies in a 200 unit radius. Affected units take additional damage when attacked for 10 seconds.

name: crippling_crossbow
lore: The ever-weeping woodgrain of this crossbow coats every bolt in a potent but short-lived narcotic sap.

abilities.title: Hobble
abilities.description: Hits an enemy for 75 damage, then slows them by 80% and reduces Health Restoration by 40% for 4 seconds. The slow gradually fades over the duration of the spell.

name: gale_guard
lore: If one truly listens, they can always rely upon the wind to make its will known.

abilities.title: Cyclonic Shield
abilities.description: Envelops the caster in an all damage barrier that absorbs 75% of incoming damage up to a max of 250. Lasts for up to 10 seconds and while the barrier is active you have 50% Slow Resistance.

name: gunpowder_gauntlets
lore: A 'harmless' prank that went entirely too far.

abilities.title: Beat the Crowd
abilities.description: Your next attack deals an additional 120 magic damage and splashes to units within 250 units for 50% of the original attack's damage plus the additional magic damage.

name: searing_signet
lore: To torture a magic user, one must devise means far beyond the mundane.

abilities.title: Burn Through
abilities.description: Instances of magic damage from spells over 55 ignites enemies, causing them to take 72 magic damage over 6 seconds.

name: serrated_shiv
lore: Too dangerous for taskwork, this blade's only purpose is vile murder.

abilities.title: Gut 'Em
abilities.description: Attacks have a 20% chance to have True Strike and deal 8% of the target's current health as bonus physical damage. Deals a flat bonus of 200 against Roshan.

name: polliwog_charm
lore: A tiny trinket that wriggles when wet.

abilities.title: Ribbit
abilities.description: Increases the health regeneration of a target ally by 8 for 14 seconds. While standing in water, the blessed unit also moves 10% faster.

name: magnifying_monocle
lore: Deadly refinement.

abilities.title: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Increases cast range by 125 and attack range by 100 (Melee & Ranged). Taking over 25 damage from a player controlled source or Roshan disables this effect for 3 seconds.

name: pyrrhic_cloak
lore: There are generals that care far less about the survival of their troops than the destruction of their enemies.

abilities.title: Retribution
abilities.description: For the next 6 seconds, 75% of damage taken by the caster is reflected to the target unit as physical damage.

abilities.title: Crystallize
abilities.description: For the next 8 seconds, up to 3 instances of spell damage over 30 have their damage reduced by 75.

name: kobold_cup
lore: The Kobold King will sip when he damn well pleases.

abilities.title: One for the Road
abilities.description: Increases movement speed of all allied units in a radius around the caster.

name: dormant_curio
lore: Everyone has an idea, but no one has a clue.
notes: Will amplify a stat on the next artifact by 30% other than cooldown, mana cost, or cast range.

abilities.title: Hidden Potential
abilities.description: Neutral Artifacts you craft while holding a Dormant Curio have their potency increased by 30%.

name: sisters_shroud
lore: A pall that draped the sarcophagus of the First Sister.
notes: Does not trigger from damage by non-player controlled creeps

abilities.title: Veiled
abilities.description: When falling below 50% HP, gain 200% evasion for 8 seconds. While active, dodging an attack decreases the evasion bonus by 75% of its current value.

abilities.title: Last Caress
abilities.description: Veiled cooldown is only reset if the wearer dies or kills an enemy hero.

name: jidi_pollen_bag
lore: Very dangerous. Very difficult to obtain more.
notes: Damage is non-lethal and classified as HP Loss.

abilities.title: Pollinate
abilities.description: Spreads pollen on all nearby enemy units, decreasing their health restoration and dealing damage over time based on their maximum health.

name: outworld_staff
lore: Proof that the lone sentinel was not always so.
notes: Damage taken when returning is non-lethal and disables Blink Dagger and other items that are muted upon taking damage.

abilities.title: Self-Exile
abilities.description: Removes the caster from the world for 0.7 seconds, making them invulnerable and disabled. When returning to the world, the caster takes 5% of their maximum health as damage.

name: dezun_bloodrite
lore: The gateway to a lost lineage of power, unlocked only with blood.

abilities.title: Blood Invocation
abilities.description: Spells have a 15% larger Area of Effect, but now additionally cost health equal to 35% of their mana cost.

name: giant_maul
lore: Crude but smashingly effective.

abilities.title: Crushing Blow
abilities.description: Empowers the next attack to be a critical hit. Hitting an enemy with an empowered attack temporarily decreases their movement speed, attack speed, and cast speed.

name: divine_regalia
lore: So magnificent, it cannot abide failure.

abilities.title: Exalted
abilities.description: Increases outgoing damage by 20%. Dying permanently disables this Neutral Item and the current Enchantment is lost.

name: divine_regalia_broken
lore: It cannot abide failure.

abilities.title: Fallen
abilities.description: You have died and thus get nothing.

abilities.title: Bloodbath
abilities.description: Converts a percentage of damage taken over the last 10 seconds into health regeneration, up to a maximum amount.

name: diffusal_blade_2
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
notes: Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
